resources.string: To download data, check your Internet connection
Check if choosen file has xls, xlsx or csv extension
Your file (csv, xlx or xlsx extension)

If you choose the "Your file" option, the file content should look similar to the examples shown below. In the case of a mistakenly created file, the application may not work correctly. In the csv file, each line starts with a word, and after the decimal point without spaces, its definitions are given. Make sure that each definition does not contain commas, because it will be treated as two or more elements.
A valid xls or xlsx file is presented below. The first column contains the defined word, and each subsequent one is its definitions.
Turn on and it locks all soft key including HOME, RECENTS, BACK, MENU buttons.
When you first enable the application, the "Accessibility" window will appear. For the application to work properly, find LinguisticLockScreen and enable the facilities.
